name: Planet Spectrum [ ASHSGBNY2021 Jam Demo ]
description:
A special jam demo edition of Project Spectrum - an early but solid and functional form of the complete game made in Smile Game Builder.

15~45 minutes of gameplay, clear "end of demo" message.

Submitted to multiple jams, but firstly and most notably to my own SGB New Year's 2021 jam.

Enjoy! and look forward to the complete release!
